title: Rahil Akbari
subtitle: Front End Web Developer | German Teacher

items.content: I have Bachelor Degree in Information Technology Engineering.After finishing university I started working as Front-End Developer and i have more than six years experience in developing and designing websites and web applications. My primary skill-set is developing, integrating, and improving UIs with HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript bases frameworks like React .I'm a quick learner, a perfectionist, enthusiastic developer who is looking to continuously develop my skills and I really enjoy designing and building websites and web applications that are accessible, SEO-friendly, responsive, and have a standard user experience, I have worked with different software development methodology like Agile, XP, Scrum etc.
